name: Conjunctions
content:
I will follow you, as long as you are honest
as though

I will follow you, as soon as you prove your honest
I'll be honest as soon as your respectful of my opinions
I respect your opinions as much as I respect dirt! None
Even if you respect dirt, that's still a normal 
I don't love you, nor respect you
if when
inasmuch, in order that
author: Brendan
